verses.verse: So Isaac <S%H3327><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> him and charged <S%H6680><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "You shall not take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> from the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

"Arise, <S%H6965><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> to Paddan-aram, to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> your mother's father; and from there <S%H1><s%> take <S%H8033><s%> to yourself a wife <S%H3947><s%> from the daughters <S%H802><s%> of Laban <S%H1323><s%> your mother's brother. <S%H3837><s%>

"And may God <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> you and make <S%H6509><s%> you fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> you, that you may become <S%H1961><s%> a company <S%H6951><s%> of peoples. <S%H5971><s%>

"May He also give <S%H5414><s%> you the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to you and to your descendants <S%H2233><s%> with you; that you may possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of your sojournings, <S%H4033><s%> which <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to Abraham. <S%H85><s%>"

Then Isaac <S%H3327><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> away, <S%H7971><s%> and he went <S%H1980><s%> to Paddan-aram to Laban, <S%H3837><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> the Aramean, <S%H761><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Rebekah, <S%H7259><s%> the mother <S%H517><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and Esau. <S%H6215><s%>

Now Esau <S%H6215><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Isaac <S%H3327><s%> had blessed <S%H1288><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> him away <S%H7971><s%> to Paddan-aram, to take <S%H3947><s%> to himself a wife <S%H802><s%> from there, <S%H8033><s%> [and that] when he blessed <S%H1288><s%> him he charged <S%H6680><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> "You shall not take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> from the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%>"
and that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> had obeyed <S%H8085><s%> his father and his mother <S%H1><s%> and had gone <S%H517><s%> to Paddan-aram.
So Esau <S%H6215><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> displeased <S%H7451><s%> his father Isaac; <S%H1><s%>

and Esau <S%H6215><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> and married, <S%H3947><s%> <S%H802><s%> besides <S%H5921><s%> the wives <S%H802><s%> that he had, Mahalath <S%H4258><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> Abraham's son, <S%H1121><s%> the sister <S%H269><s%> of Nebaioth. <S%H5032><s%>
Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> departed <S%H3318><s%> from Beersheba <S%H884><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> toward Haran. <S%H2771><s%>

And he came <S%H6293><s%> to a certain place <S%H4725><s%> and spent <S%H3885><s%> the night <S%H3885><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> had set; <S%H935><s%> and he took <S%H3947><s%> one of the stones <S%H68><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> it under his head, <S%H4763><s%> and lay <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> in that place. <S%H4725><s%>

And he had <S%H2492><s%> a dream, <S%H2492><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> a ladder <S%H5551><s%> was set <S%H5324><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> with its top <S%H7218><s%> reaching <S%H5060><s%> to heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> the angels <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> were ascending <S%H5927><s%> and descending <S%H3381><s%> on it.

And behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> stood <S%H5324><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> it and said, <S%H559><s%> "I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of your father Abraham <S%H1><s%> and the God <S%H85><s%> of Isaac; <S%H430><s%> the land <S%H3327><s%> on which <S%H776><s%> you lie, <S%H834><s%> I will give <S%H7901><s%> it to you and to your descendants. <S%H5414><s%>

"Your descendants <S%H2233><s%> shall also be like the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and you shall spread <S%H6555><s%> out to the west <S%H3220><s%> and to the east <S%H9506><s%> and to the north <S%H6828><s%> and to the south; <S%H5045><s%> and in you and in your descendants <S%H2233><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%> be blessed. <S%H1288><s%>

"And behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am with you, and will keep <S%H8104><s%> you wherever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> you go, <S%H1980><s%> and will bring <S%H7725><s%> you back <S%H7725><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> land; <S%H127><s%> for I will not leave <S%H5800><s%> you until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> what <S%H834><s%> I have promised <S%H1696><s%> you."

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> awoke <S%H3364><s%> from his sleep <S%H8142><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Surely <S%H403><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is in this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> and I did not know <S%H3045><s%> it."

And he was afraid <S%H3372><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "How <S%H4100><s%> awesome <S%H3372><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> place! <S%H4725><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is none <S%H369><s%> other <S%H369><s%> than <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> is the gate <S%H8179><s%> of heaven. <S%H8064><s%>"

So Jacob <S%H3290><s%> rose <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> that he had put <S%H7760><s%> under his head <S%H4763><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> it up as a pillar, <S%H4676><s%> and poured <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> on its top. <S%H7218><s%>

And he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Bethel; <S%H1008><s%> however, <S%H199><s%> previously <S%H7223><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> had been Luz. <S%H3870><s%>

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> made <S%H5087><s%> a vow, <S%H5088><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "If <S%H518><s%> God <S%H430><s%> will be with me and will keep <S%H8104><s%> me on this <S%H2088><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%> that I take, <S%H1980><s%> and will give <S%H5414><s%> me food <S%H3899><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> and garments <S%H899><s%> to wear, <S%H3847><s%>
and I return <S%H7725><s%> to my father's house <S%H1004><s%> in safety, <S%H7965><s%> then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will be my God. <S%H430><s%>

"And this <S%H2088><s%> stone, <S%H68><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have set <S%H7760><s%> up as a pillar, <S%H4676><s%> will be God's house; <S%H1004><s%> and of all <S%H3605><s%> that Thou dost give <S%H5414><s%> me I will surely <S%H6237><s%> give <S%H6237><s%> a tenth <S%H6237><s%> to Thee."
